name: Vertex Obstacles
description:
A game where you must make it through the obstacles(colored in red) and get to the white flag to win each stage. In order to win the game you must make it through all of the stages.

Note: If you see the policy violation message just hit the X and continue to play. If you can’t play just click the link and play the game there and leave a comment to let me know. Thanks 

CONTROLS

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Press Spacebar to jump

Use the Mouse to look around

P or Esc to Pause

PS- Title screen for the downloadable game says Vertex Parkour.  Minor Error on my part(it was the original name for the game but I decided to change it. Its still a good name in my opinion but I already had parkour in one of my other games so I decided to change it up a bit). 

Downloadable game also has no ads but no leaderboard. Free browser based game has ads but also has a leaderboard where you can compare the time you take in each stage to other players if you log in.

Feel free to report bugs or leave feedback in the comments.
